Posts.Content: Terps wrote: Hello everyone, my name is Kristen and I'm 45, live in beautiful Colorado. Found a lump last weekend. I was just doing housework and noticed a tender spot in my breast. Did a check and found a definite lump. I do regular self checks so knew this was new and different. Feels oblong and fairly solid. Had a mammo less than a year ago that was normal. Had a well woman check up a month ago, including breast exam, and it was also normal. Went to my PC Friday and she confirmed the mass. I'm going for a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound a week from Monday. I need to keep busy until then, this is a bit distracting. I'm trying not to worry. I don't have pain, but it's definitely tender at times. I also feel some heaviness and a similar sensation when I was nursing and milk would come in. Any thoughts or advice would be appreciated. Thanks so much!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting for mammo and U/S Terps Moderators

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2014 07:03AM Terps wrote: hi Kristin, I hope Monday does very well for you. I'll be thinking of you.
Posts.Title: Waiting for mammo and U/S Terps Moderators
